attributes.action: Lower the speed limit in gallants lane to 30mph
attributes.additional_details: I’d like them look into the current speed limit and change it to 30mph as it is a country lane
attributes.background: My wife almost had a head on collision today with a car going far too fast. One of our pets was also knocked down and killed by a speeding motorist that didn’t stop.

rejection.details:
We are sorry to hear about your pet, and your wife's experience, but we can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about speed limits on local roads are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
